alert.note: Alert for Davis; Wapello (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 5:31PM CDT until June 24 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wapello County in southeastern Iowa... Northeastern Davis County in southeastern Iowa... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Agency, or near Ottumwa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 526 PM, weather spotters in southern Ottumwa reported tennis ball sized hail. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Agency around 535 PM CDT. Eldon around 545 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southeastern Iowa.
